title: Suggestion - Featured Game Modes
body:
To whom it may concern,

I've seen the uber bots of death or whatever they're called in YouTube videos but I've never actually played against them, I guess this is just to raise some awareness to that feature, would be pretty cool for it to be a thing again.

Maybe even a featured game mode where the spells that the bots used given to every champion as a player vs player feature, I think that would be pretty insane, just my thoughts though.

Please leave any feedback and respond in the poll.

Cheers.

replies.body:
"Doom Bots" 

Was fun to play but once you learn how to beat them is pretty easy. They will probably bring them back someday, like most game modes.

There were only like 15 different bots so only that many champions were actually augmented. Don't think it would work in PvP.
